systemData.Description: The standard system metadata of a resource type.

properties.Description: The properties of a capability resource.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

publisher.Description: String of the Publisher that this Capability extends.

targetType.Description: String of the Target Type that this Capability extends.

parametersSchema.Description: URL to retrieve JSON schema of the Capability parameters.

urn.Description: String of the URN for this Capability Type.

systemData.Description: The system metadata of the experiment resource.

identity.Description: The identity of the experiment resource.

properties.Description: The properties of the experiment resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

type.Description: String of the resource identity type.

principalId.Description: GUID that represents the principal ID of this resource identity.

tenantId.Description: GUID that represents the tenant ID of this resource identity.

startOnCreation.Description: A boolean value that indicates if experiment should be started on creation or not.

name.Description: String that represents a Capability URN.

duration.Description: ISO8601 formatted string that represents a duration.

type.Description: Enum that discriminates between action models.

key.Description: The name of the setting for the action.

value.Description: The value of the setting for the action.

duration.Description: ISO8601 formatted string that represents a duration.

type.Description: Enum that discriminates between action models.
Enum that discriminates between action models.
Enum of the Target reference type.

id.Description: String of the resource ID of a Target resource.

systemData.Description: The system metadata of the target resource.

properties.Description: The properties of the target resource.

systemData.Description: The system metadata properties of the target type resource.

location.Description: Location of the Target Type resource.

properties.Description: The properties of the target type resource.

displayName.Description: Localized string of the display name.

propertiesSchema.Description: URL to retrieve JSON schema of the Target Type properties.

resourceTypes.Description: List of resource types this Target Type can extend.

systemData.Description: The system metadata properties of the capability type resource.

location.Description: Location of the Capability Type resource.

properties.Description: The properties of the capability type resource.

publisher.Description: String of the Publisher that this Capability Type extends.

targetType.Description: String of the Target Type that this Capability Type extends.

displayName.Description: Localized string of the display name.

parametersSchema.Description: URL to retrieve JSON schema of the Capability Type parameters.

urn.Description: String of the URN for this Capability Type.
